test-case.name: fn-ceiling-1
test-case.description: check dynamic type of fn:ceiling on argument of union of numeric types.
test-case.test: for $x in (1, xs:decimal(2), xs:float(3), xs:double(4)) return if ((ceiling($x)) instance of xs:integer) then "integer" else if ((ceiling($x)) instance of xs:decimal) then "decimal" else if ((ceiling($x)) instance of xs:float) then "float" else if ((ceiling($x)) instance of xs:double) then "double" else error()
